name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Staff Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in designing and implementing robust, high-performance applications. Proficient in **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, **Django**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Node.js**, and cloud services like **AWS**. Skilled in modern software development methodologies, including Domain-Driven Design and CI/CD practices using **Jenkins** and **GitLab** for continuous integration and automated testing. 

I possess deep expertise in **Kafka** and **SQS** for building scalable event-driven systems, along with RESTful APIs and GraphQL for seamless integration. My extensive background in AI and ML allows me to effectively incorporate intelligence into applications. Throughout my career, I have focused on industries such as healthcare and finance, emphasizing compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have a solid foundation in observability and have led the development of enterprise-grade solutions utilizing microservices architecture. My passion for innovation drives me to create secure applications that push technological boundaries.

experience.responsibilities:

- Led the implementation of **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Gitlab**, ensuring consistent and efficient deployment practices across 100% of services.
- Architected the cloud infrastructure leveraging **AWS** and **Docker**, ensuring system reliability and uptime of over **99.9%** by employing best practices in **Domain-Driven Design** and observability.

- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement comprehensive **automated testing** strategies using industry-standard tools, leading to a **30%** reduction in production bugs.

- Championed the development of data visualization tools utilizing modern frameworks, enabling stakeholders to gain insights from complex datasets easily.
- Engaged closely with product management to align on requirements and deliverables, ensuring that priorities and deadlines were consistently met or exceeded.

• Designed and implemented backend services using **Ruby on Rails** and **Django** to support scalable financial transactions, achieving a throughput improvement of **30%**.
• Developed RESTful APIs and **GraphQL** endpoints for dynamic data access, ensuring efficient communication between frontend and backend systems.
• Leveraged **CI/CD** practices using **Jenkins** and **GitLab** to automate software deployment, reducing release cycle time by **40%**.
• Led the modernization of applications with a focus on **Domain-Driven Design**, enhancing code maintainability and system reliability.
• Integrated **Kafka** and **SQS** to facilitate seamless event-driven architecture for real-time financial transaction processing and alerts.
• Implemented robust observability practices that monitor system performance, reducing downtime by **25%**.
• Conducted automated testing with frameworks in **Ruby**, **Python**, and **JavaScript**, improving code quality and reducing bugs by **50%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive the adoption of **AI** and **ML** technologies for predictive analytics and operational efficiency in financial services.

Enhanced backend services for a global e-commerce platform utilizing **Python (Django)** and **Node.js (Express)**, focusing on scalability and performance across key modules including checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.

Leveraged **AI** and **ML** techniques to integrate recommendation engines, utilizing tools such as **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to optimize product listings and boost conversion rates through real-time data analysis.

Engineered event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for real-time features, facilitating dynamic inventory tracking and order updates, with an aim to enhance customer support responsiveness.

Developed and maintained frontend applications with **JavaScript** frameworks including **React (18)** and **Vue 3**, applying **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** to ensure seamless, fast user experiences across web and mobile platforms, achieving a **25% increase in user engagement**.

Implemented efficient data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, ensuring fast, reliable access to data for high-traffic workflows, and achieving **99.9% uptime** on all database interactions.

Designed and executed CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, streamlining deployment processes and reducing release times by **40%**, while ensuring robust observability for all microservices.

Applied RESTful APIs and **GraphQL** to optimize data transfer between frontend and backend, ensuring a more flexible and efficient system architecture.

Developed payment processing features integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards through tokenized transactions to secure sensitive customer data.

Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and utilized OAuth 2.0, ensuring secure customer and admin access while achieving GDPR compliance and safeguarding user data integrity throughout the platform.
